item.title: Esperanto
item.description: The fascinating story of a group of naturists that for decades has been promoting Esperanto as a simple common language to unite the world. Feed: https://www.naturistlivingshow.com/feed/podcast

item.title: Going Back to Move Forward
item.description: NOTE: To see the photos that I reference in this episode, see the post on my Substack. On one of our recent morning walk and talks, a group of photographers and I were talking about how much worse Instagram has gotten over the past few years in terms of exposure and engagement. We all agreed that it seems like most photographers weâ€™ve spoken to about it have very similar feedback. Subscribers, reach, and engagement are all a fraction of what they used to be. And the platform that was once all... Feed: https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/1966802.rss
